00050 : QTabWidget( parent ),
00051   m_actualCoinNode( 0 ), m_isPart(false)

00054         addTab( new FieldContainerWidget( 0, "" ), tr("Shape") );

00084                         }

00090                 m_isPart =true;

00098 void ParametersView::SelectionChangedToKit( SoBaseKit* coinNode/*, QStringList parts*/ )
00099 {
00100         clear();
00101 
00102         QStringList     parts = ContainerNodeParts( coinNode );
00103 
00104         m_actualCoinNode = coinNode;
00105         m_isPart =false;
00106         for( int i = 0; i< parts.size(); ++i )
00107         {
00108                 QString partName = parts[i];
00109 
00110                 if (partName == QString( "" )) AddTab( coinNode, "" );
00111                 else if (partName[partName.length()-1]=='*')
00112                 {
00113                         QString partName2 = partName.left(partName.length()-1);
00114                         SoNodeKitListPart* parentGroup = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinNode->getPart(partName2.toStdString().c_str(), false ) );
00115                         if( parentGroup )
00116                         {
00117                                 int child=0;
00118                                 while( child < parentGroup->getNumChildren() && child <10)
00119                                 {
00120                                         SoNode* element = (SoNode*)  parentGroup->getChild(child);
00121                                         if( element )   AddTab( element, "" );
00122                                         child++;
00123                                 }
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 else
00127                 {
00128                         SoNode* coinPart = coinNode->getPart(partName.toStdString().c_str(), false );
00129                         if( coinPart != 0 ) AddTab( coinPart, partName );
00130                 }
00131         }
00132 
00133 }
00134 
00138 void ParametersView::UpdateView()
00139 {
00140         if (m_isPart) SelectionChangedToPart (m_actualCoinNode);
00141         else SelectionChangedToKit(  (SoBaseKit*)m_actualCoinNode );
00142 }
00143 
00147 void ParametersView::SetValue( SoNode* node, QString paramenterName, QString newValue )
00148 {
00149         emit valueModificated( node, paramenterName, newValue );
00150 }
00151 
00155 void ParametersView::AddTab( SoNode* coinNode, QString partName )
00156 {
00157         QString type = coinNode->getName().getString();
00158         if (type.length()<=0) type = coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString();
00159 
00160         FieldContainerWidget* nodeContainer = new FieldContainerWidget( coinNode, partName, this );
00161         addTab( nodeContainer, type );
00162         connect( nodeContainer, SIGNAL( valueModificated( SoNode*, QString, QString ) ), this, SLOT( SetValue( SoNode*, QString, QString ) ) );
00163 }
00164 
00170 QStringList ParametersView::ContainerNodeParts( SoBaseKit* coinNode )
00171 {
00172         QStringList parts;
00173         if( !coinNode && ! coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return parts;
00174 
00175         SoBaseKit* nodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNode );
00176         QString type = nodeKit->getTypeId().getName().getString();
00177 
00178         if ( type == "TLightKit" )      parts<<QString( "transform" )<<QString( "icon" )<<QString( "tsunshape" );
00179         else if( type == "TShapeKit" )  parts<<QString( "shape" )<<QString( "appearance.material" );
00180         else if( type == "TAnalyzerKit" )       parts<<QString( "parameter" )<<QString( "result" )<<QString( "levelList*" )<<QString( "transform" );
00181         else if( type == "TAnalyzerResultKit" ) parts<<QString( "result" );
00182         else    parts<<QString( "transform" );
00183 
00184         return parts;
00185 }
